attributes.action: do something to prevent abuse of facilities provided for the disabled
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Disabled Community has fought long and hard for facilities such as Disabled Person's Parking permits,toilet facilities for the disabled, yet everywhere they are used and abused by the able bodied community without fear of legal or any other sanction  such abuse is anti social behaviour and should be seen and treated as such.  Many instances are seen where "Blue" Badges re used where the users have no rightAble bodied people can see no problem in using the facilities for the disabledto the exclusion or inconvenience of the disabled

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
